Articles.Content:
Well, WorldSpace functions in .24, just so you guys know!

Now time to get back to nuking Ker-.... er, helping Kerbin achieve global dominance!

A Question

The Lunar Module, is included in this pack? or Im need download ?

Gracias You!
How is the Black Arrow coming along

I think this is dead, author hasn't been on for many a moon.

- - - Updated - - -

Edit:

Lovad is still active, maybe he just doesn't check this thread much. I'm sure he still cares.

- - - Updated - - -
Download link is not working for me one of you have a working link ?
Same not working.
Hi guys. Long time was not on the forum. Now decided to return to work on the mod. Now rework Saturn 5.
This is great to hear Lovad.
Happy to see you again!

Yes!!! thank you very much Lovad!

The Japan Sci-Fi Command module Kyoko is also awesome since there are 0 japanese spacecrafts out yet, is it possible that you can tweak this one too? When I open the parachute something weird happens and im suddenly teleported in the middle of nowhere.

Yes!!! thank you very much Lovad!

The Japan Sci-Fi Command module Kyoko is also awesome since there are 0 japanese spacecrafts out yet, is it possible that you can tweak this one too? When I open the parachute something weird happens and im suddenly teleported in the middle of nowhere.

It is Kraken power
That's great, Lovad!

Hi guys. Long time was not on the forum. Now decided to return to work on the mod. Now rework Saturn 5.

Good to see you back! I can continue helping you in testing if you'll need it.
good to hear I cant wait.

Thanks, I'm glad to be back.

In Kyoko was an attempt to combine all the essential elements. And it seems that something went wrong. Think about what you can do.
Your Saturn V was the first Mod I downloaded nearly a year ago, I have not looked back since. I am really glad to see you are back. Welcome back. If you need any help testing things just let me know.
WIP - Remodeling and retexturing heavy rocket Saturn V
Lovad are you gonna make LM too?
These look fantastic.
is there a working download link to the latest beta version?  link that is listed in this thread gives a 404 error at dropbox
The reason you get errors is that this was created for KSP 0.23 and is over a year old. Spaceport has been dead long since and with the new forum most links within the forum won't work.

1 hour ago, Tex_NL said:

The reason you get errors is that this was created for KSP 0.23 and is over a year old. Spaceport has been dead long since and with the new forum most links within the forum won't work.

well considering i said i was getting 404 errors at dropbox and not spaceport...and was getting that error before the old forums got moved...i dont get the error for an older version of this mod that is on dropbox (its a 2 year old download link that still works)
Now this... this needs to be a thing again.
